Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Objective: Reclaim the theater and cast out all enemies!
Level.Script: Set Lesbian Talkable AddStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,Nobeta SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,Nobeta
Set Lesbian Not Talkable RemoveStatus/Kyat,Talkable RemoveStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,INVALID

Sandra Progresses Script SetVal/Sandra Name Progress,+:1 IfValRun/Sandra Name Progress,=,4,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Asandr Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Sandra Winterbloom IfValRun/Sandra Name Progress,=,3,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Rasand Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Asandr Winterbloom IfValRun/Sandra Name Progress,=,2,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Rasand Winterbloom IfValRun/Sandra Name Progress,=,1,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Andras Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Drasan Winterbloom

Swap Out Unit Run/Store Character Stats,Prefix,SwapOut,Character Name,-STR:Swap Out Name- RemoveUnit/-STR:Swap Out Name-,false SpawnUnit/0,-STR:Swap In Name-,-VAL:SwapOutY Coord-,-VAL:SwapOutX Coord-,-VAL:SwapOutFacing-,,,-STR:SwapOutInventoryString-,false Run/Load Character Stats,Character Name,-STR:Swap In Name-,Prefix,SwapOut SpawnUnit/Army Number,Load ID (using : in lieu of /),Y coordinate,X coordinate,Facing (Up Down Left Right),Triggers (using : in lieu of , and :: in lieu of / -- optional),Tags (using : in lieu of , and :: in lieu of / -- optional),Inventory (delimit items with : -- optional),Drop Into Place (true or false -- optional)

Store Character Stats SetList/Variables To List,Accuracy|Dodge|Counter Limit|Experience|Level|Morale|Perception|Psy|Reflexes|Slash Res.|Pierce Res.|Crush Res.|Mental Res.|Heat Res.|Cold Res.|Shadow Res.|Light Res.|Poison Res.|Speed|Strength|Health|Salary|Facing|X Coord|Y Coord|Drain|Damage InvToList/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Prefix-Inventory-STR:Suffix- ListToString/-STR:Prefix-Inventory-STR:Suffix-,:,-STR:Prefix-InventoryString-STR:Suffix- ForLoop/-ii-,0-LASTINLIST[Variables To List],1,SetValByStat,-STR:Prefix-LIST{Variables To List,-ii-}-STR:Suffix-,=,-STR:Swap Out Name-,LIST{Variables To List,-ii-}

Load Character Stat Subroutine SetValByVal/NextLoadedStatValue,=,-STR:Prefix--STR:Stat--STR:Suffix- Log/Load Character Stat Subroutine Testing Log -VAL:NextLoadedStatValue- -STR:Character Name- -STR:Stat- SetStatByVal/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Stat-,=,NextLoadedStatValue

Dialogue.Branch: / Run/Set Lesbian Not Talkable SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,+:1 IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,1,Go To First Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,2,Go To Second Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,3,Go To Third Lesbian Dialogue EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/First Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Second Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Third Lesbian Dialogue
/ SetVal/Turn Trigger,+:1 IfValRun/Lesbian Discussions Count,l,3,Set Lesbian Talkable IfValRun/Sandra Name Progress,=,1,SetString,DrasanReadyToShave,Drasan Winterbloom EndConvImmediately/ /

/ SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,=:0 SetVal/Turn Trigger,0 AddTagToArmy/1,Passive Run/Set Lesbian Talkable SetVal/Sandra Name Progress,0 SetString/Sandra Current Name,Andras Winterbloom SetArea/Clothing Zone,0,8,0,4 SetString/DrasanReadyToShave,INVALID EndConvImmediately/
Kyat/Wow, this would be a discussion! Our first one, I think. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/Isn't this our second conversation? Well then. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/This is our third conversation. Well, I guess that's it then. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/Man, I really don't wanna fight you. I was really hoping someone else would handle you... look at those arms! You could tear me apart! AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left AddPortrait/Harrien,Harrien,right Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/...Well, that just sucks all the fun out of fighting you. What's someone so meek doing with this lot? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/I... really don't know. I've been trying to find where it went wrong, but all I can really conclude is that I made very dumb decisions. Continue./NextBranch

Harrien/Sounds like a lot of us, honestly. ...Look, I can't undo the stuff you've been dealt, but I can offer you an out. C'mon and join us! If you're on the field, you must have some skill, right? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/W-w-what? Um, I... no, I'd really just weigh you down. Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/Hey, c'mon, look at these guns. A little extra weight won't bug me. Continue./NextBranch

Clark/...W-well, okay. ...Thank you. SetStat/Clark,Army,=:0 RemoveConv/Clark Dialogue RemoveStatus/Clark,Talkable RemovePortrait/Clark AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left SetStat/Clark,Morale,=4 Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/Oh, what do we have here? [Andras sees an open container of clothes for performers] This is... AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Andras Winterbloom/[Andras nervously grabs an outfit from the chest] AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Concerned Continue./NextBranch
Drasan Winterbloom/I could... use a change. Run/Sandra Progresses Script AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Happy PortraitParticles/Drasan Winterbloom,Heart Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/If I can change anything, then... [Drasan carefully presses a sword to their lip] SetString/DrasanReadyToShave,INVALID AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Nervous Continue./NextBranch

Rasand Winterbloom/...that feels much better. Run/Swap Out Unit,Prefix,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Rasand Winterbloom AddPortrait/Rasand Winterbloom,Rasand Winterbloom,,Happy PortraitParticles/Rasand Winterbloom,Heart Continue./NextBranch
